"Malazgirt zaferinin yıld dönümü nedeniyle" - This section contains the main news content, discussing various topics such as the anniversary of the Malazgirt victory, President Erdoğan's cabinet meeting, and political visits, including details about significant events and political figures.
"Bu kez adres ahlak Aki" - The closing remarks summarize the news and provide a final statement, indicating the end of the program.
